sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { climate } from "./services/helpers" export const Country = ({ country }) => { if (country) { const [weather, setWeather] = useState({}) const languages = Object.values(country.languages) const capitalLatitude = country.capitalInfo.latlng[0] const capitalLongitude = country.capitalInfo.latlng[1] useEffect(() => { climate(capitalLatitude, capitalLongitude) .then((response) => response.data) .then((weatherData) => setWeather(weatherData)) }, []) return (

{country.name.common}

Capital: {country.capital}

Area: {country.area}

Languages:

    {languages.map((language) => (
  • {language}
    • ))}

Wheater in {country.capital}

Temperature {weather.current.temp} Celsius

Wind {weather.current.wind_speed} m/s

) } }
